verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \add is\add* my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* my \w footstool|strong="H7272"\w*: where \add is\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that ye \w build|strong="H1129"\w* unto me? and where \add is\add* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of my \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*?

For all those \add things\add* hath mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and all those \add things\add* have been, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but to this \add man\add* will I \w look|strong="H5027"\w*, \add even\add* to \add him that is\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and of a \w contrite|strong="H5223"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w trembleth|strong="H2730"\w* at my \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

He that \w killeth|strong="H7819"\w* an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \add is as if\add* he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; he that \w sacrificeth|strong="H2076"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, \add as if\add* he cut \w off|strong="H6202"\w* a \w dog’s|strong="H3611"\w* \w neck|strong="H6202"\w*; he that \w offereth|strong="H5927"\w* an \w oblation|strong="H4503"\w*, \add as if he offered\add* \w swine’s|strong="H2386"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; he that \w burneth|strong="H2142"\w* \w incense|strong="H3828"\w*, \add as if\add* he \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* an \w idol|strong="H0205"\w*. Yea, they have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* their own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* in their \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w*.\f + \fr 66.3 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*\f + \fr 66.3 \ft burneth: Heb. maketh a memorial of\f*

I also will \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* their \w delusions|strong="H8586"\w*, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* their \w fears|strong="H4035"\w* upon them; because when I \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, none did \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*; when I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, they did not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: but they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* before mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \add that\add* in which I \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* not.\f + \fr 66.4 \ft delusions: or, devices\f*

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, ye that \w tremble|strong="H2730"\w* at his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*; Your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* you, that cast you \w out|strong="H5077"\w* for my \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*: but he shall \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* to your \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, and they shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.

A \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* from the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w rendereth|strong="H7999"\w* \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w* to his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

Before she \w travailed|strong="H2342"\w*, she brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*; before her \w pain|strong="H2256"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, she was \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w* of a man \w child|strong="H2145"\w*.

Who hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* such a thing? who hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* such things? Shall the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be made to bring \w forth|strong="H2342"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? \add or\add* shall a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* be \w born|strong="H3205"\w* at \w once|strong="H6471"\w*? for as soon \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w travailed|strong="H2342"\w*, she brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* her \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

Shall I bring to the \w birth|strong="H7665"\w*, and not cause to bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: shall \w I|strong="H0589"\w* cause to bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H6113"\w* \add the womb\add*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 66.9 \ft not…: or, not beget?\f*

\w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* ye with \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* with her, all ye that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* her: \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* for \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* with her, all ye that \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w* for her:

That ye may \w suck|strong="H3243"\w*, and be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with the \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* of her \w consolations|strong="H8575"\w*; that ye may milk \w out|strong="H4711"\w*, and be \w delighted|strong="H6026"\w* with the \w abundance|strong="H2123"\w* of her \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.\f + \fr 66.11 \ft abundance: or, brightness\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w extend|strong="H5186"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to her like a \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* like a \w flowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w stream|strong="H5158"\w*: then shall ye \w suck|strong="H3243"\w*, ye shall be \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* upon \add her\add* \w sides|strong="H6654"\w*, and be \w dandled|strong="H8173"\w* upon \add her\add* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

As \w one|strong="H0376"\w* whom his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w comforteth|strong="H5162"\w*, so will I \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* you; and ye shall be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And when ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add this\add*, your \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w*, and your \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* shall \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w* like an \w herb|strong="H1877"\w*: and the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* toward his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \add his\add* \w indignation|strong="H2194"\w* toward his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

For, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and with his \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* like a \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*, to \w render|strong="H7725"\w* his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* with \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, and his \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* with \w flames|strong="H3851"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

For by \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* and by his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* will the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: and the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w many|strong="H7231"\w*.

They that \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* themselves, and \w purify|strong="H2891"\w* themselves in the \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add tree\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w swine’s|strong="H2386"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and the \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w*, and the \w mouse|strong="H5909"\w*, shall be \w consumed|strong="H5486"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 66.17 \ft behind…: or, one after another\f*

For I \add know\add* their \w works|strong="H4639"\w* and their \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*: it shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that I will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w*; and they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

And I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* among them, and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* those that \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* of them unto the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \add to\add* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*, \w Pul|strong="H6322"\w*, and \w Lud|strong="H3865"\w*, that \w draw|strong="H4900"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \add to\add* \w Tubal|strong="H8422"\w*, and \w Javan|strong="H3120"\w*, \add to\add* the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, that have not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w fame|strong="H8088"\w*, neither have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*; and they shall \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*.

And they shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* all your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \add for\add* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* out of all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and in \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and in \w litters|strong="H6632"\w*, and upon \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*, and upon swift \w beasts|strong="H3753"\w*, to my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* in a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 66.20  t litters: or, coaches *
And I will also \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of them for \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \add and\add* for \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For as the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, which I will \w make|strong="H6213"\w*, shall \w remain|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, so shall your \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* and your \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w remain|strong="H5975"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* \w from|strong="H1767"\w* one new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w* to \w another|strong="H2320"\w*, and \w from|strong="H1767"\w* one \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* to \w another|strong="H7676"\w*, shall all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 66.23 \ft from one new…: Heb. from new moon to his new moon, and from sabbath to his sabbath\f*

And they shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon the \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me: for their \w worm|strong="H8438"\w* shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, neither shall their \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*; and they shall be an \w abhorring|strong="H1860"\w* unto all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.
